vector-art.title: CLR Fan Art
vector-art.description: I made this vector art for CLR because he inspires my work. I used clean shapes and strong colors to match his style.

vector-art.title: Lil Peep Tribute
vector-art.description: A vector fan art for Lil Peep. His music has a soft and emotional vibe, so I used simple shapes and calm colors to show that feeling.

vector-art.title: Waiian Fan Art
vector-art.description: This is a vector fan art of Waiian, a rapper and member of Kartell EM. I used smooth gradients and clean lines to show his strong presence and style.

vector-art.title: DougBrock x MKGM Collab Art
vector-art.description: A vector fan art for DougBrock, a podcaster, and MKGM, a music producer. I showed both of them in one clean layout to show their teamwork and creative vibe.

vector-art.title: Polo Pi Fan Art
vector-art.description: This vector art is for Polo Pi. I used bold contrast and simple shapes to reflect his attitude and unique style.

vector-art.title: Flowg Fan Art
vector-art.description: A fan art vector piece for Flowg. I used clean lines and bold colors to capture his personality and presence.

vector-art.title: Kartell EM Portrait
vector-art.description: This vector fan art is for Kartell EM, a Filipino hip-hop group known for their raw street style. I used simple forms and smooth details to show their unity as a collective.

vector-art.title: Shanti Dope Fan Art
vector-art.description: A vector fan art for Shanti Dope. I mixed calm and strong elements to match the mood and rhythm of his music.

vector-art.title: Yah Wais & Gudds Duo Art
vector-art.description: A duo fan art of Yah Wais and Gudds. I used balanced colors and dynamic posing so both artists stand out equally.

vector-art.title: Self Portrait Vector
vector-art.description: A self-portrait vector artwork showing my style as an artist. I made this to represent my growth and the artists who inspire me.
